direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve constructing an edit script for sequences, sharing similar control flow and recursive structure.
getScript relies on getMiddleSnake to find the middle snake, which is crucial for constructing the edit script.
buildSnake is used within getMiddleSnake, which in turn is used by getScript to construct the edit script.
Both methods involve appending commands to an edit script, though they handle different types of commands.
